name: Simple Arena
description:
- use the arrow keys to move
- Click to punch
- Click restart to restart

Hello, this is the first game i have ever made and published like this. 
In this game you are a gladiator you punched people till they explode.


when you run the game it may same "Arena but better" but thats because I failed the first time around so when I remade it I named it "Arena but better".  

I used construct to make this and NW to export.
